TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UrlPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UrlPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 对控件用来标识包含 URL 值的字符串属性的特性进行定义。

span.span: Defines the attribute that controls use to identify string properties containing URL values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是应用于表示 URL 的控件属性的属性。The attribute is an attribute applied to a control property that represents a URL. 除了标记字符串属性作为表示 URL属性定义标识了可用于筛选属性的特定文件类型的属性。In addition to marking a string property as representing a URL, the attribute defines the property that identifies specific file types that can be used to filter against the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 URL 特定属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中，特性应用于`TargetUrl`属性的`CustomHyperLinkControl`类。In this code example, a attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 该属性设置 ASP.NET 文件的特定文件筛选的器。The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实例使用初始化类属性设置为值"\*。\*"。A default instance of the class is initialized with the property set to the value "\*.\*". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 URL 特定属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中，默认值特性应用于`TargetUrl`属性的`CustomHyperLinkControl`类。In this code example, a default attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 该属性指示支持所有的 URL 类型，并指定默认文件筛选器设置为"\*。\*".The attribute indicates support for all URL types and specifies a default file filter set to "\*.\*". [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将 属性设置为指定的字符串。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property to the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类创建与此构造函数初始化与属性设置为`filter`。An instance of a class created with this constructor is initialized with the property set to `filter`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 URL 特定属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中，特性应用于`TargetUrl`属性的`CustomHyperLinkControl`类。In this code example, a attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 该属性设置 ASP.NET 文件的特定文件筛选的器。The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Filter As String
public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取与 URL 特定属性关联的文件筛选器。

span.span: Gets a file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

value.span: 与 URL 特定属性关联的文件筛选器。

span.span: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器提供了基于文件选择器中的筛选器属性。A designer provides a filter in file selectors based on the attribute. 默认情况下，它将初始化为"\*。\*"，它指定具有文件扩展名的所有文件。By default, it is initialized to "\*.\*", which specifies all files with a file extension. 可以为更具体的文件类型; 设置筛选器例如，筛选器"\*.aspx"指示仅 ASP.NET 文件由 URL 特定属性。You can set the filter for more specific file types; for example, the filter "\*.aspx" indicates that only ASP.NET files are represented by the URL-specific property.
